Data Theorem | Security, Software Engineering | Palo Alto, CA, USA | ONSITE, FULL-TIME Data Theorem scans & secures mobile applications. We have built a technology to automatically scan and detect security and privacy issues in mobile Apps (Android, and iOS). Primary languages are Python/JavaScript(React)/Java(Android). Any Reverse Engineering skills are a plus, background in Security is not required.
